data.title: Global Mass Transit Report
data.text:
Régie Autonome des Transports Parisiens (RATP) Group has secured a six-year contract from the Paris-Saclay municipal federation to operate the Plateau de Saclay bus network.

Read More

Régie Autonome des Transport Parisiens (RATP) Group and Enedis have extended their partnership for two additional years to support the development of sustainable transport services.

Read More

Régie Autonome des Transport Parisiens (RATP) Group and Enedis have extended their partnership for two additional years to support the development of sustainable transport services.

Read More

Régie Autonome des Transport Parisiens (RATP) Group has acquired Mappy, a navigation service provider, to enhance its Mobility as a Service (MaaS) services.

Read More

Régie Autonome des Transport Parisiens (RATP) Group has acquired Mappy, a navigation service provider, to enhance its Mobility as a Service (MaaS) services.

Read More

RATP Dev, a subsidiary of France based RATP Group, has renewed its operations and maintenance (O&M) contract for the Casablanca Tram.

Read More

French public transport company Groupe Régie Autonome des Transports Parisiens (RATP), through its subsidiary RATP Dev, has signed a partnership with Abu Dhabi-based Zain Capital LLC, part of the Lakhraim Business Group, to set up a joint venture (JV) for transport and urban planning projects in the United Arab Emirates (UAE).

Read More

French public transport company Groupe Régie Autonome des Transports Parisiens (RATP), through its subsidiary RATP Dev, has signed a partnership with Abu Dhabi-based Zain Capital LLC, part of the Lakhraim Business Group, to set up a joint venture (JV) for transport and urban planning projects in the United Arab Emirates (UAE).
